tweets.author: のもとけ
tweets.text: Former Hanshin Duplantier, sudden move to join DeNA; Expected as pillar of starting rotation, to team up with Fujinami in Japan too; Became free agent from Hanshin in December; Despite reports of SoftBank as frontrunner, joins rival Central League team (Daily Sports) - Yahoo!

thread_replies.author: のくらふ
thread_replies.text: Does that mean there was some kind of rift with the Hanshin, since you're ditching the championship-winning team to join a team weaker than Hanshin, and in the same league, no less?

thread_replies.author: 呉
thread_replies.text:
Yokohama???
If this is the case, I could still forgive a transfer to SoftBank
Were they instigated around April? 
This is way too malicious, isn't it

thread_replies.author: ひろきくん
thread_replies.text:
Huh?  
You're going to participate in the championship trip, right?  
You have nerves of steel, huh lol  
Next year, with Dup and Fujinami facing the Hanshin Tigers, it's gonna get heated in all sorts of ways lol

thread_replies.author: エポキシ
thread_replies.text:
That's good, right?  
Last year they won the league the fastest, y'know,  
So giving up one dupe or whatever wouldn't hurt the Central League, would it?  
Plus, Ishite and Devarni are joining too, so something like this  
Would be just right.

thread_replies.author: マサカリブレイド
thread_replies.text: Hawks joining decision: Deplanti enters the BayStars!?

thread_replies.author: ポンちっち(ﾎﾟﾝｷｭｰ)
thread_replies.text: There's a 2% chance that it turned into "Well then, if the winning Central League is fine, no complaints, right?" because you guys were saying stuff like "SoftBank spy!" or "You were talking in Nishi-Siri, right?"

thread_replies.author: のろいへび@ふぉぺんち
thread_replies.text:
I don't understand the meaning anymore...
I want to go to the majors, so I won't negotiate with Hanshin
↓
Apparently, SoftBank is playing a money game with MLB
↓
I, a Bay fan, "Whoa, SoftBank is amazing"
↓
Sudden turn of events: Decision to join DeNA‼︎
↓
I "I can't believe

thread_replies.author: 昇竜復活祈願 @中日ドラゴンズ
thread_replies.text:
What the heck does this mean...
It's the SoftBank, isn't it...

Something like this
All Central League fans
Must be seeing spots... . . . .
A transfer to the same league, and to a tough rival DeNA, is
Way too crazy... . . . .

While preaching team loyalty, gets lured away by money to the same league
